blogPost.excerpt: For me, as a developer, finding an interesting idea to work on has always been challenging. If you are stuck at the idea stage, subscribe to the IdeasFor.dev newsletter to receive weekly project ideas in your inbox.
blogPost.body: For me, as a developer, finding an interesting idea to work on has always been challenging. If you are stuck at the idea stage, subscribe to the IdeasFor.dev newsletter to receive weekly project ideas in your inbox.
blogPost.title: Ideas for dev - New ideas for your next project
blogPost.author: Saeed Moqadam

localize.description: 对我来说，作为一名开发者，找到一个有趣的想法一直是个挑战。如果你还停留在想法阶段，请订阅IdeasFor.dev通讯，每周都能在你的收件箱中收到项目想法。
localize.tagline: 为您的下一个项目提供新思路

localize.description: 對我來說，作爲一名開發者，找到一個有趣的想法一直是個挑戰。如果你還停留在想法階段，請訂閱IdeasFor.dev通訊，每週都能在你的收件箱中收到項目想法。

previous.excerpt: Our next generation of Flutter, built for web, mobile, and desktop Today, Google's announcing Flutter 2: a major upgrade to Flutter that enables developers to create beautiful, fast, and portable apps for any platform.
previous.title: Flutter 2.0 - Build beautiful native apps in record time, now on web too

localize.description: 我们的下一代Flutter，为网络、移动和桌面打造 今天，谷歌宣布Flutter 2：Flutter的重大升级，使开发人员能够为任何平台创建美丽、快速和可移植的应用程序。
localize.tagline: 在创纪录的时间内构建漂亮的本地应用程序，现在也可以在网络上使用了

localize.description: 我們的下一代Flutter，爲網絡、移動和桌面打造 今天，谷歌宣佈Flutter 2：Flutter的重大升級，使開發人員能夠爲任何平臺創建美麗、快速和可移植的應用程序。
localize.tagline: 在創紀錄的時間內構建漂亮的本地應用程序，現在也可以在網絡上使用了

next.excerpt: Allfactor is the leading market analytics platform that provides data-driven solutions for ecommerce brands to thrive in the industry. The tools enable sellers to optimize product offering, track performance, and conduct competitive analysis across platforms.
next.title: Allfactor Analytics - The leading market analytics platform for data e-commerce

localize.description: Allfactor是领先的市场分析平台，为电商品牌提供数据驱动的解决方案，使其在行业中蓬勃发展。这些工具使卖家能够优化产品供应，跟踪业绩，并进行跨平台的竞争分析。
localize.tagline: 领先的数据电商市场分析平台。

localize.description: Allfactor是領先的市場分析平臺，爲電商品牌提供數據驅動的解決方案，使其在行業中蓬勃發展。這些工具使賣家能夠優化產品供應，跟蹤業績，並進行跨平臺的競爭分析。
localize.tagline: 領先的數據電商市場分析平臺。
